step_feedback.feedback: Good job on the first step! You performed the shoulder blade squeeze and circular motion well. Remember to keep your movements smooth and controlled.

In step 2, focus on coordinating your breath with the shoulder movement. Inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize rib expansion.  Try to maintain a smoother, more controlled circular motion.

Step 3 shows some inconsistency.  Concentrate on keeping your shoulders relaxed and avoid any tension in your neck or upper arms.  Try to maintain a consistent circular motion throughout the four repetitions.

exercise_summary: You did a good job attempting the shoulder rolls exercise. Remember to coordinate your breathing with the shoulder movements, inhaling deeply as you pull your shoulders back.  Focus on smooth, controlled circular motions to improve your range of motion and lymphatic flow.
